languages.text: "Добавь в опись арбитра: бежит от чувств, отталкивает {mf|того|ту}, что любит его несмотря ни на что".
"Add to the Arbitrator's record: running from his feelings and pushing away the one person who loves him regardless."
languages.original_text: "Добавь в опись арбитра: бежит от чувств, отталкивает {mf|того|ту}, что любит его несмотря ни на что".

traits.locale_text: "Add to the Arbitrator's record: escaping his feelings, pushing away the one who loves him regardless."
"Add to the Arbitrator's record: escaping his feelings, pushing away the one who loves him regardless."
"Add to the Arbitrator's record: running from his feelings and pushing away the one person who loves him regardless."
"Add to the Arbitrator's record: running from his feelings and pushing away the one person who loves him regardless."

languages.text: 「仲裁人の記録に『感情から逃げて、何があっても愛してくれる唯一の相手まで突き放した』と書いとけ」
languages.original_text: "Add to the Arbitrator's record: running from his feelings and pushing away the one person who loves him regardless."

traits.locale_text: 「仲裁人の記録に『感情から逃げて、何があっても愛してくれる唯一の相手まで突き放した』と書いとけ。」

languages.text: «Adenda para el expediente del Arbitrator: reprime sus sentimientos y aparta de su lado a la única persona que lo ama a pesar de todo».
languages.original_text: "Add to the Arbitrator's record: running from his feelings and pushing away the one person who loves him regardless."

traits.locale_text: «Adenda para el expediente del Arbitrator: reprime sus sentimientos y aparta de su lado a la única persona que lo ama a pesar de todo».

languages.text: “把这句话也加在法务官的记录里面：他逃避自己真正的感情，毫无顾忌地把爱他的人推到一旁。”
languages.original_text: "Add to the Arbitrator's record: running from his feelings and pushing away the one person who loves him regardless."

traits.locale_text: “把这句话也加在法务官的记录里面：他逃避自己真正的感情，毫无顾忌地把爱他的人推到一旁。”

languages.text: "Ergänzung zum Bericht des Arbitrators: Läuft vor seinen Gefühlen davon und stößt die eine Person zurück, die ihn trotzdem liebt."
languages.original_text: "Add to the Arbitrator's record: running from his feelings and pushing away the one person who loves him regardless."

traits.locale_text: "Ergänzung zum Bericht des Arbitrators: Läuft vor seinen Gefühlen davon und stößt die eine Person zurück, die ihn trotzdem liebt."

languages.text: « À rajouter au dossier de l'arbitrator : il refuse d'admettre ses sentiments et repousse la seule personne disposée à l'aimer malgré tous ses défauts. »
languages.original_text: "Add to the Arbitrator's record: running from his feelings and pushing away the one person who loves him regardless."

traits.locale_text: « À rajouter au dossier de l'arbitrator : il refuse d'admettre ses sentiments et repousse la seule personne disposée à l'aimer malgré tous ses défauts. »

languages.text: "Yargıcı'nın kaydına eklensin: Duygularından kaçıyor ve onu ne olursa olsun seven tek insanı itiyor."
languages.original_text: "Add to the Arbitrator's record: running from his feelings and pushing away the one person who loves him regardless."

traits.locale_text: "Yargıcı'nın kaydına eklensin: Duygularından kaçıyor ve onu ne olursa olsun seven tek insanı itiyor."
